review: Doctor is very patient and gives good time to explain the problem and any queries. Some doctors get irritated when parents become impatient but this doctor was polite throughout. Clinic is well equipped with small lab for tests like CBP, crc etc and an onsite pharmacy. Available in evenings which helps to take appointment post office hours.
Nice experience in doctor and treatment, i am suggesting to all  for better treatment, this is budget hospital for better treatment
